actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

actions.name: Dominate Mind
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Eldritch Restoration
traits.description: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. *Failure:* The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater. While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes 6 (1d12) Acid damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

actions.name: Lash
actions.description: The aboleth makes one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Psychic Drain
actions.description: If the aboleth has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 (1d10) Hit Points.

effects.name: Foul Water
effects.description: Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. Creatures other than the aboleth and its allies that drink such water must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

effects.name: Psionic Projection
effects.description: While in its lair, the aboleth can cast *Project Image*, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16). When casting the spell this way, the spell's range is 1 mile, and the aboleth can use its telepathy as if it were in the illusion's space.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the aboleth dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

name: Chuul
languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chuul makes two Pincer attacks and uses Paralyzing Tentacles.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two pincers.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature Grappled by the chuul. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the *Detect Magic* spell but isn't itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cloaker makes one Attach attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Attach
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the cloaker attaches to it. While the cloaker is attached, the target has the Blinded condition, and the cloaker can't make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the cloaker halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the cloaker has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

bonusActions.name: Phantasms
bonusActions.description: The cloaker casts the *Mirror Image* spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the cloaker starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

bonusActions.name: Moan
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the cloaker. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the cloaker's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this cloaker's Moan for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 feet. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Acid damage.

actions.name: Stench Spray
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature the flumph can see within 15 feet. *Failure:* The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for 1d4 hours, and has the Poisoned condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures have the Poisoned condition while in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the coated target. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short or Long Rest.

traits.name: Advanced Telepathy
traits.description: The flumph perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Prone Deficiency
traits.description: If the flumph receives the Prone condition, roll a die. On an odd number, it has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph makes a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, ending the Incapacitated condition on a success.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.description: The flumph's thoughts can't be read by any means, and magic can't detect its location or observe it remotely.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d6) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition. The target dies if it is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack. Its body is then absorbed into the mouther, leaving only equipment behind.

actions.name: Blinding Spittle
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 10, each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 30 feet. *Failure:* 7 (2d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mouther's next turn.

traits.name: Aberrant Ground
traits.description: The ground in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the mouther is Difficult Terrain.

traits.name: Gibbering
traits.description: The mouther babbles incoherently while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 10, any creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther while it is babbling. *Failure:* The target rolls 1d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The grell makes one Beak attack and one Paralyzing Tentacles attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12) from two of ten tentacles. The target is also subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

traits.name: Abduct
traits.description: The grell needn't spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nothic makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Rotting Gaze
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature the nothic can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 17 (5d6) Necrotic damage. *Success:* Half damage.

bonusActions.name: Weird Insight
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 14, one creature the nothic can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* The nothic magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

name: Otyugh
languages: Otyugh (doesn't allow the receiving creature to respond telepathically)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The otyugh makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition. Whenever the Poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15. *Failure:* The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) and doesn't return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target. *Success:* The Poisoned condition ends.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two tentacles.

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature Grappled by the otyugh. *Failure:* 16 (3d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the otyugh's next turn. *Success:* Half damage only.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The beholder randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the beholder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

bonusActions.name: Antimagic Cone
bonusActions.description: The beholder's central eye emits an antimagic wave in a 150-foot Cone. Until the start of the beholder's next turn, that area acts as an *Antimagic Field* spell, and that area works against the beholder's own Eye Rays.

actions.name: Chomp
actions.description: The beholder makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Glare
actions.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays three times.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 feet. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The death tyrant randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the death tyrant has already used that ray during this turn):

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the death tyrant fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

bonusActions.name: Negative Energy Cone
bonusActions.description: The death tyrant's central eye emits an imperceptible, magical wave of negative energy in a 150-foot Cone. Creatures in that area can't regain Hit Points until the start of the death tyrant's next turn. An intact Humanoid corpse there instantly rises as a **Zombie** under the death tyrant's control and takes its turn immediately after the death tyrant on the same initiative count.

actions.name: Chomp
actions.description: The death tyrant makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Glare
actions.description: The death tyrant uses Eye Rays.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The spectator uses Eye Rays twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The spectator randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 90 feet of itself (roll 1d4; reroll if the spectator has already used that ray during this turn):

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The spectator succeeds on a saving throw against a spell, or a spell's attack roll misses it. *Response-Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the spectator can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The animal lord makes two attacks, using Rend or Radiant Ray in any combination, and uses Animal Spirit.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +13, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +12, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 20 (4d6 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Animal Spirit
actions.description: The animal lord conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, one creature the animal lord can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 28 (4d10 + 6) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* One of the following effects occurs:

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The animal lord casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Animal Friendship*, *Animal Messenger*, *Speak with Animals*
**2/Day Each:** *Awaken*, *Greater Restoration*
**1/Day Each (Sage Only):** *Animal Shapes*, *Sunburst*

traits.name: Animal Lordship
traits.description: An animal lord represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM's choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the animal lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Lordly Presence
traits.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 20, any enemy that starts its turn in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the animal lord. *Failure:* The target suffers one of the following effects:

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The animal lord has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The animal lord shape-shifts into a Huge or smaller version of the animal it represents or a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Feral Strike
actions.description: The animal lord moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Rend attack.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.description: The animal lord makes one Radiant Ray attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (1d12 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the couatl's next turn.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature the couatl can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 8 (1d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The couatl casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Detect Magic*, *Detect Thoughts*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Create Food and Water*, *Dream*, *Greater Restoration*, *Scrying*, *Sleep*

traits.name: Shielded Mind
traits.description: The couatl's thoughts can't be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The couatl casts *Bless*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Sanctuary*, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The deva makes two Holy Mace attacks.

actions.name: Holy Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The deva casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Shapechange* (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Raise Dead*

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the deva dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The deva has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The deva casts *Cure Wounds*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Otherworldly Strike
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic or Radiant damage (empyrean's choice).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The empyrean casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
**1/Day Each:** *Bless*, *Lesser Restoration* (as an action)

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The empyrean can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The empyrean has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Healing Word
bonusActions.description: The empyrean casts *Healing Word*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The empyrean makes two attacks, using Sacred Weapon or Divine Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Sacred Weapon
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +17, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 31 (6d6 + 10) Force damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the empyrean's next turn. The target can choose not to be Stunned, in which case it takes an extra 21 Force damage that bypasses Resistance or Immunity.

actions.name: Divine Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +15, range 600 ft. *Hit:* 35 (6d8 + 8) Necrotic or Radiant damage (empyrean's choice).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The empyrean casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):
**At Will:** *Calm Emotions*, *Greater Restoration*, *Pass without Trace*, *Water Breathing*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Plane Shift*

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the empyrean fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The empyrean has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bolster
actions.description: The empyrean gains 10 Temporary Hit Points, and the empyrean and each ally within 30 feet of it gain Advantage on D20 Tests until the end of the empyrean's next turn. The empyrean can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Shockwave of Glory
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 23, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the empyrean. *Failure:* 27 (6d8) Force damage, and the target has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only. *Failure or Success:* The empyrean can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Smite
actions.description: The empyrean makes one Divine Ray attack.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The planetar makes three Radiant Sword attacks or uses Holy Burst twice.

actions.name: Radiant Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +12, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Holy Burst
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, each enemy in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the planetar can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The planetar casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Control Weather*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Raise Dead*

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.description: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the planetar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The planetar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The planetar casts *Cure Wounds*, *Invisibility*, *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The solar makes two Flying Sword attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Slaying Bow.

actions.name: Flying Sword
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +15, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d6 + 8) Slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) Radiant damage. *Hit or Miss:* The sword magically returns to the solar's hand or hovers within 5 feet of the solar immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Slaying Bow
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 21, one creature the solar can see within 600 feet. *Failure:* If the creature has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes 24 (4d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The solar casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 25):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*
**1/Day Each:** *Commune*, *Control Weather*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Resurrection*

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.description: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.description: If the solar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The solar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid
bonusActions.description: The solar casts *Cure Wounds* (level 2 version), *Lesser Restoration*, or *Remove Curse*, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Blinding Gaze
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 25, one creature the solar can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Blinded condition for 1 minute. *Failure or Success:* The solar can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Radiant Teleport
actions.description: The solar teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 25, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the solar at its destination space. *Failure:* 11 (2d10) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Radiant Horn
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The unicorn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
**At Will:** *Detect Evil and Good*, *Druidcraft*
**1/Day Each:** *Calm Emotions*, *Dispel Evil and Good*, *Entangle*, *Pass without Trace*, *Word of Recall*

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the unicorn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The unicorn has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Unicorn's Blessing
bonusActions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn and casts *Cure Wounds* or *Lesser Restoration* on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Charging Horn
actions.description: The unicorn moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it makes one Radiant Horn attack.

actions.name: Shimmering Shield
actions.description: The unicorn targets itself or one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target gains 10 (3d6) Temporary Hit Points, and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the unicorn's next turn. The unicorn can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The armor makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The broom doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Slash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Smother
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the rug can give it the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, is suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The rug can smother only one creature at a time.

name: Colossus
languages: Understands Celestial and Common but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The colossus makes three attacks, using Slam or Radiant Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +18, reach 20 ft. *Hit:* 32 (4d10 + 10) Bludgeoning damage, and the colossus pushes the target up to 20 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Radiant Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +18, range 300 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d10) Radiant damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Divine Beam
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 26, each creature in a 300-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 65 (10d12) Radiant damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The colossus can't shape-shift.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.description: The colossus moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it can make one Slam attack at any point during that move.

name: Helmed Horror
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Arcane Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Force damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The helmed horror has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spell Immunity
traits.description: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include *Heat Metal*, *Lightning Bolt*, and *Magic Missile*.

name: Homunculus
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing damage, and the target is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the homunculus's next turn. *Failure by 5 or More:* The target has the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. While Poisoned, the target has the Unconscious condition, which ends early if the target takes any damage.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.description: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Gear
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Gear Flinger
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Force damage.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the modron dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The blade magically returns to the modron's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the modron dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The spear magically returns to the modron's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the modron dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.description: If the modron dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Electrical Discharge
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Paralysis Gas
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.description: If the modron dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Fearsome Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 11, one creature the scarecrow can see within 30 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. While Frightened, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

name: Shield Guardian
languages: Understands commands given in any language but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The guardian makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

traits.name: Bound
traits.description: The guardian is magically bound to an amulet. While the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the guardian.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The guardian regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

traits.name: Spell Storing
traits.description: A spellcaster who wears the guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The guardian can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster's spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

reactions.name: Protection
reactions.description: *Trigger:* An attack roll hits the wearer of the guardian's amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the guardian. *Response:* The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the guardian's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The balor makes one Flame Whip attack and one Lightning Blade attack.

actions.name: Flame Whip
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 30 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Force damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the balor pulls the target up to 25 feet straight toward itself, and the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Lightning Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 21 (3d8 + 8) Force damage plus 22 (4d10) Lightning damage, and the target can't take Reactions until the start of the balor's next turn.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.description: The balor explodes when it dies. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 20, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the balor. *Failure:* 31 (9d6) Fire damage plus 31 (9d6) Force damage. *Success:* Half damage. *Failure or Success:* If the balor dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.description: At the end of each of the balor's turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the balor takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.description: If the balor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The balor has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The balor teleports itself or a willing demon within 10 feet of itself up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the balor can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The barlgura makes one Tormenting Bite attack and two Thrash attacks.

actions.name: Tormenting Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Thrash
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The barlgura casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the barlgura dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The barlgura jumps up to 40 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the chasme dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The chasme has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

bonusActions.name: Drone
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the chasme (demons automatically succeed on this save). *Failure:* The target has the Unconscious condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. The target succeeds automatically after 10 minutes or if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to empty a flask of Holy Water on it. *Success:* The target is immune to this chasme's Drone for 24 hours.

name: Dretch
languages: Abyssal (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fetid Cloud
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the dretch. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the creature can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both, and it can't take Reactions.

name: Swarm of Dretches
languages: Abyssal (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 12 (3d6 + 2) Slashing damage, or 9 (3d4 + 2) Slashing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

While Poisoned, the target can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both, and it can't take Reactions.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Pummel
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature Grappled by the glabrezu. *Failure:* 15 (3d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting

traits.name: Demonic Restoration

traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: If the goristro dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.description: If the hezrou dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.description: The hezrou has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 16, any creature that starts its turn in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the hezrou. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The hezrou jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (2d4) Slashing damage.

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Necrotic damage.

traits.name: Contortionist
traits.description: The manes can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the manes at the end of the manes's turn. *Failure:* The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this manes's Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the manes takes the Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 17, one Medium or smaller creature the marilith can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the marilith dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The marilith has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reactive
traits.description: The marilith can take one Reaction on every turn of combat.

bonusActions.name: Teleport

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The marilith is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The marilith adds 5 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Force damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The nalfeshnee teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the nalfeshnee dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The nalfeshnee has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Horror Nimbus
bonusActions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the nalfeshnee. *Failure:* 28 (8d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the nalfeshnee out of line of sight. *Success:* The target is immune to this nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Pursuit
reactions.description: *Trigger:* Another creature the nalfeshnee can see ends its move within 120 feet of the nalfeshnee. *Response:* The nalfeshnee uses Teleport, but its destination space must be within 10 feet of the triggering creature.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The quasit casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Scare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 10, one creature within 20 feet. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.description: The quasit shape-shifts to resemble a bat (Speed 10 ft., Fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., Climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., Swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Umbral Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (3d8 + 3) Psychic damage.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the demon dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.description: While in Bright Light, the demon has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the demon takes the Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vrock makes two Shred attacks.

actions.name: Shred
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spores
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the vrock. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

actions.name: Stunning Screech
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the vrock (demons succeed automatically). *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Thunder damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the vrock's next turn.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the vrock dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The vrock has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yochlol makes two Caustic Lash attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast *Web* or *Dominate Person* if available.

actions.name: Caustic Lash
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 25 (6d6 + 4) Acid damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The yochlol casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.description: If the yochlol dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Abyss.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yochlol has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webs.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The yochlol shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or a Medium spider or back into its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

reactions.name: Toxic Escape
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The yochlol is hit by an attack roll. *Response:* The yochlol halves the attack's damage to itself (round down), and it teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature within 5 feet of the yochlol's destination space. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, it has the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Claws attack and one Tail attack, or it makes two Hurl Flame attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from both claws.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 150 ft. *Hit:* 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

traits.name: Barbed Hide
traits.description: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 5 (1d10) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes one Beard attack and one Infernal Glaive attack.

actions.name: Beard
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Infernal Glaive
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 12. *Failure:* The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses 5 (1d10) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two Claw attacks and one Infernal Sting attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Infernal Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two Chain attacks and uses Conjure Infernal Chain.

actions.name: Chain

actions.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
actions.description: The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature the devil can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Fire damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the end of the devil's next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself. *Success:* The chain disappears.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

reactions.name: Unnerving Gaze
reactions.description: *Trigger:* A creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil and can see the devil. *Response* - *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, the triggering creature. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this devil's Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The erinyes makes three Infernal Sword attacks and can use Entangling Rope.

actions.name: Entangling Rope (Requires Magic Rope)
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 16, one creature the erinyes can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Force damage, and the target has the Restrained condition until the rope is destroyed, the erinyes uses a Bonus Action to release the target, or the erinyes uses Entangling Rope again.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the erinyes dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The erinyes has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Rope
traits.description: The erinyes has a magic rope. While bearing it, the erinyes can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the erinyes for 1 hour or more, or if the erinyes dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the erinyes can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The erinyes is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. *Response:* The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three attacks, using Searing Fork or Hurl Flame in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Infernal Tail.

actions.name: Searing Fork
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +8, range 150 ft. *Hit:* 26 (5d8 + 4) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

actions.name: Infernal Tail
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the devil can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* 10 (1d8 + 6) Necrotic damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn't have one. While wounded, the target loses 10 (3d6) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 17 Wisdom (Medicine) check.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three Ice Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

actions.name: Ice Spear
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. *Hit:* 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Cold damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't take a Bonus Action or Reaction, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both. *Hit or Miss:* The spear magically returns to the devil's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 15 (3d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Wall
actions.description: The devil casts *Wall of Ice* (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The imp casts *Invisibility* on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.description: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Vile Slime
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +2, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

traits.name: Hellish Restoration
traits.description: If the lemure dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a *Bless* spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The swarm makes two Vile Slime attacks.

actions.name: Vile Slime
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Poison damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) Poison damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

traits.name: Hellish Restoration
traits.description: If the swarm dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a *Bless* spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening large enough for a Small creature. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pit fiend makes one Bite attack, two Devilish Claw attacks, and one Fiery Mace attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 18 (3d6 + 8) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make the following saving throw. *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 21. *Failure:* The target has the Poisoned condition. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points and takes 21 (6d6) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Devilish Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 26 (4d8 + 8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Fiery Mace
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +14, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (4d6 + 8) Force damage plus 21 (6d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
actions.description: The pit fiend casts *Fireball* (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21). It can replace one *Fireball* with *Hold Monster* (level 7 version) or *Wall of Fire*.

traits.name: Diabolical Restoration
traits.description: If the pit fiend dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.description: The pit fiend emanates an aura in a 20-foot Emanation while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 21, any enemy that starts its turn in the aura. *Failure:* The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this pit fiend's aura for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.description: If the pit fiend fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The pit fiend has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes two attacks, using Infernal Fork and Tail Spine in any combination.

actions.name: Infernal Fork
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 20/80 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The devil doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 22 (5d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 49 (14d6) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +11, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. *Failure:* 54 (12d8) Acid damage. *Success:* Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks):
**At Will:** *Detect Magic*, *Fear*, *Melf's Acid Arrow* (level 3 version)
**1/Day Each:** *Speak with Dead*, *Vitriolic Sphere*

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Cloud of Insects
actions.description: *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature the dragon can see within 120 feet. *Failure:* 22 (4d10) Poison damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain Concentration until the end of its next turn. *Failure or Success:* The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Fear*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

effects.name: Acrid Haze
effects.description: Odorous and stifling fog covers the area within 1 mile of the lair, rendering that area Lightly Obscured. Travel for creatures other than the dragon and its allies takes twice the usual time in that area.

effects.name: Foul Water
effects.description: Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. A creature that drinks such water must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +15, reach 15 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Acid damage.

traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Cloaked Flight
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Invisibility* on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Sonic Boom
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Shatter*. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Tail Swipe
actions.description: The dragon makes one Rend attack.

effects.name: Sinkholes
effects.description: Sinkholes form more frequently in the area within 1 mile of the lair. Whenever a creature in that area other than the dragon and its allies finishes a Long Rest, roll 1d20. On a 1, a sinkhole opens beneath the creature, and the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall 2d4 x 10 feet into the sinkhole.

effects.description: Dust devils and thunderstorms rage within 1 mile of the lair. The area is Lightly Obscured.

actions.name: Fiery Rays
actions.description: The dragon uses Spellcasting to cast *Scorching Ray* (level 3 version). The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Rend attack.

effects.name: Burning Heat
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is an area of extreme heat. A burning creature or object takes an additional 1d4 Fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

effects.name: Smoldering Haze
effects.description: The area within 1 mile of the lair is Lightly Obscured with clouds of ash. Whenever a creature other than the dragon or one of its allies finishes a Long Rest in that area, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

traits.description: The salamander has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
