At the end of this time, the egg turns into a **Slaad Tadpole**, which chews out of the host and kills it.

Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a **1**, Charmed; on a **2**, Frightened; on a **3**, Poisoned; or on a **4**, Incapacitated.

actions.name: Curse of the Riddle
actions.description: *Intelligence Saving Throw:* DC 15, one creature the sphinx can see within 60 feet. *Failure:* 21 (6d6) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed with a riddle. The cursed target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. In addition, if it takes the Magic action, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or that action is wasted. The cursed target can take a Study action to make a DC 15 Intelligence check, solving the riddle and ending the curse on a success. The curse ends early if the sphinx curses another target.

traits.description: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance

actions.description: The ghost casts the *Etherealness* spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The ghost is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 13, one Humanoid the ghost can see within 5 feet. *Failure:* The target is possessed by the ghost; the ghost disappears, and the target has the *Incapacitated* condition and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The ghost's game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

effects.description: Whenever a Humanoid dies within 1 mile of the lair, its soul is immediately consumed by the lich. A Humanoid whose soul is consumed in this way can be brought back to life only by a *True Resurrection* or *Wish* spell.

regionalEffects.endCondition: If the lich is destroyed or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately. These effects resume if the lich gains a new body (see its Undead Restoration trait).

A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later in a different body unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its corpse. If it revives, it animates a Humanoid corpse elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

bonusActions.name: Vow of Revenge
bonusActions.description: The revenant curses one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The revenant knows the distance to and direction of the cursed target, even if it is on a different plane of existence. The curse ends on the target if the revenant uses this Bonus Action on a different creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant makes two Suffocate attacks.

actions.name: Suffocate
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +8, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 10 (1d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is suffocating. The revenant can have up to two targets Grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Haunting Glare
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the revenant. *Failure:* The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its remains. If it revives, it animates another group of corpses elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant makes two Object Slam attacks and uses Invitation.

actions.name: Object Slam
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9 (with Advantage if the target is inside the revenant's space), reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 27 (5d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Invitation
actions.description: *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. *Failure:* The target is teleported inside the revenant's space and swallowed. A swallowed creature has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the revenant.

traits.name: Haunted Zone
traits.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, any creature that casts a spell while inside the revenant's space. *Failure:* The spell fails and is wasted.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.description: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later unless *Dispel Evil or Good* is cast on its remains. If it revives, it animates another Gargantuan object or structure elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

actions.name: Draining Swipe
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score decreases by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a **Shadow** rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.description: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.description: While in sunlight, the shadow has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the shadow takes the Hide action.

name: Skeleton
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, range 80/320 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the skeleton moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the skeleton moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

name: Flaming Skeleton
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The skeleton makes two attacks, using Flame Scepter or Hurl Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Flame Scepter
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 60 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Fire damage.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The skeleton explodes when it dies. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 12, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the skeleton. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Fire damage. *Success:* Half damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The skeleton sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

name: Specter
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the specter has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The familiar makes two Umbral Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Umbral Dagger
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) Necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

traits.name: Vampiric Connection
traits.description: While the familiar and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the familiar telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the familiar's senses.

bonusActions.name: Deathless Agility
bonusActions.description: The familiar takes the Dash or Disengage action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. *Failure:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses:

bonusActions.name: Deathless Agility
bonusActions.description: The vampire takes the Dash or Disengage action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes one Bite attack and one Shadow Strike attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Shadow Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Cold damage.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.description: The vampire takes 10 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the vampire takes the Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: The vampire makes two Grave Strike attacks and uses Bite.

actions.name: Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two hands.

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 17, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. *Failure:* 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a **Vampire Spawn** under the vampire's control.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses:

bonusActions.name: Charm
bonusActions.description: The vampire casts *Charm Person*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17), and the duration is 24 hours. The Charmed target is a willing recipient of the vampire's Bite, the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the vampire.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it shape-shifts into a Tiny bat (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or it returns to its vampire form. Anything it is wearing transforms with it.

actions.name: Beguile
actions.description: The vampire casts *Command*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17). The vampire can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Deathless Strike
actions.description: The vampire moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes two attacks, using Grave Strike or Sickening Ray in any combination.

actions.name: Grave Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (1d8 + 5) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Sickening Ray
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 16 (2d10 + 5) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the vampire's next turn.

actions.name: Hunger of Hadar
actions.description: The vampire casts *Hunger of Hadar* (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Shadow Escape
traits.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, it teleports into its resting place unless it is in running water or sunlight. If it can't teleport, it is destroyed. Once inside its resting place, it has the Paralyzed condition for 1 hour, after which it regains 1 Hit Point.

traits.name: Vampire Weakness
traits.description: The vampire has these weaknesses:

bonusActions.name: Sanguine Drain
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 18, one creature the vampire can see within 30 feet that isn't a Construct or an Undead. *Failure:* 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Beguile
actions.description: The vampire casts *Command*, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18). The vampire can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Umbral Strike
actions.description: The vampire moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Grave Strike or Sickening Ray attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wight makes two attacks, using Necrotic Sword or Necrotic Bow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Life Drain.

actions.name: Necrotic Sword
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Bow
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +4, range 150/600 ft. *Hit:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 13, one creature within 5 feet. *Failure:* 6 (1d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wight has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Shock
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d8 + 2) Lightning damage.

traits.name: Ephemeral
traits.description: The wisp can't wear or carry anything.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The wisp sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

bonusActions.name: Consume Life
bonusActions.description: *Constitution Saving Throw:* DC 10, one living creature the wisp can see within 5 feet that has 0 Hit Points. *Failure:* The target dies, and the wisp regains 10 (3d6) Hit Points.

bonusActions.name: Vanish
bonusActions.description: The wisp and its light have the Invisible condition until the wisp's Concentration ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the wisp makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 21 (4d8 + 3) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.description: The wraith targets a Humanoid corpse within 10 feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target's spirit rises as a **Specter** in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

name: Zombie
languages: Understands Common plus one other language but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d8 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

name: Ogre Zombie
languages: Understands Common and Giant but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

name: Beholder Zombie
languages: Understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The zombie uses Eye Rays twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.description: The zombie randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll 1d4; reroll if the zombie has already used that ray during this turn):

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The arcanaloth makes three Fiendish Burst attacks. It can replace one attack with a Banishing Claw attack.

actions.name: Fiendish Burst
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. *Hit:* 31 (4d12 + 5) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Banishing Claw (Requires Soul Tome)
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 10 (2d4 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. *Charisma Saving Throw:* DC 17. *Failure:* The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The arcanaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the arcanaloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly and revives with all its Hit Points in Gehenna.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The arcanaloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Tome
traits.description: The arcanaloth has a magic tome. While holding or carrying the tome, the arcanaloth can use its Banishing Claw action.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The arcanaloth teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.description: The arcanaloth casts *Counterspell* in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from two of four claws, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Mercurial Trident
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +7, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The trident magically returns to the mezzoloth's claw immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The mezzoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the mezzoloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Gehenna.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mezzoloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The mezzoloth teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can teleport one creature it is grappling to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of its destination space.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Mercurial Axe
actions.description: *Melee or Ranged Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. *Hit:* 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. *Hit or Miss:* The axe magically returns to the nycaloth's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the nycaloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Gehenna.

traits.name: Magic Resistance

bonusActions.name: Shadowy Teleport
bonusActions.description: The nycaloth has the Invisible condition for 1 minute, and it teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The condition ends early immediately after it deals damage.

actions.name: Multiattack

multiattackActions: ultroloth uses Hypnotic Gaze and makes two Mercurial Whip

actions.name: Mercurial Whip

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. *Failure:* 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the ultroloth's next turn. *Success:* The target is immune to this ultroloth's Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 9 (2d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the horse moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The wolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.
